title: Gaon Weibo Chart
text: Gaon Weibo Chart, part of <a href="Gaon%20Chart">Gaon Chart</a>, was a weekly chart that ranked the top 10 most popular <a href="K-pop">K-pop</a> groups and the top 30 most popular individual K-pop artists in <a href="China">China</a>, using data from <a href="Sina%20Weibo">Weibo</a>. This chart started the week of June 29, 2014. The artists with the most weeks at number one are <a href="Jung%20Yong-hwa">Jung Yong-hwa</a> with 69 weeks as an individual artist and <a href="BTS">BTS</a> with 36 weeks as a group. The chart was discontinued in July 2017.
